properties.title: Splashes Leisure Centre
properties.description: Splashes Leisure Pool, Bloors Lane, Rainham, Gillingham, Kent, ME8 7EGWeb link: http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/splashesleisurecentre.aspxTelephone 01634 377509Email splashes.leisure@medway.gov.ukMore information Splashes Leisure Centre has an indoor pool with a wave maching and flume, a toddlers pool, and a 35-station Echoes gym.

properties.title: The Stirling Centre
properties.description: The Stirling Centre, 601 Maidstone Road, Rochester, Kent, ME1 3QJWeb link: http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/thestirlingcentre.aspxTelephone 01634 818422 Email leisure@medway.gov.ukMore information The Stirling Centre has excellent facilities, including a multi-purpose sports hall.

properties.title: Strood Leisure Centre
properties.description: Strood Sports Centre, Watling Street, Strood, Rochester, Kent, ME2 3JQWeb link: http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/stroodleisurecentre.aspxTelephone 01634 723888Email leisure@medway.gov.ukMore information Strood leisure centre hosts a wide range of activities suitable for all the family. properties.title: Lordswood Leisure Centre
properties.description: Lordswood Leisure Centre, North Dane Way, Lordswood, Chatham, Kent, ME5 8YEWeb link: http://www.lordswood-leisure.co.uk/Telephone leisure@medway.gov.ukEmail leisure@medway.gov.ukMore information Lordswood Leisure Centre offers badminton, football, basketball, netball, trampoling, short mat bowls and martial arts. It is managed by by Lordswood Sports and Social Club on behalf of Medway Council.

properties.title: Deangate Ridge Sports Complex
properties.description: Deangate Ridge Sports Complex, Dux Court Road, Hoo St Werburgh, Rochester, Kent, ME3 8RZWeb link: http://www.deangateridge.co.uk/Telephone 01634 251180 Email dr.golfcourse@medway.gov.ukMore information Situated on the Hoo peninsula, with breathtaking views of the Medway estuary, Deangate Ridge Golf Club is one of the finest municipal golf courses in Kent. The Deangate Ridge complex has a 200-seat stadium with a 400-metre six-lane athletics track, home to the Medway and Maidstone Athletics Club. The track is open daily to the public from 10am-9pm.
